alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 2:54PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Graham and east central Pinal Counties through 345 PM MST... At 254 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles north of Aravaipa Canyon Wilderness, or 12 miles east of Christmas, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Aravaipa Canyon Wilderness and San Carlos Reservoir. This includes Route 70 between mile markers 277 and 281. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
